subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Marquette Golden Eagles were again too much for Seton Hall, defeating the Pirates for a third time this season. Also, Pittsburgh, who has reached six of the last seven Big East title games, advanced.
snippet: The Marquette Golden Eagles were again too much for Seton Hall, defeating the Pirates for a third time this season. Also, Pittsburgh, who has reached six of the last seven Big East title games, advanced.
